name: Battle Hunter (1999)
description: Battle Hunter, known in Japan as Battle Sugoroku: Hunter (バトルすごろく ハンター) and in Europe as The Hunter, is an anime-styled tactical role-playing game, released for the PlayStation in 1999. It was released in Japan as part of the SuperLite 1500 series of budget games. The game revolves around a player-controlled hunter that must compete with three other hunters in order to win a relic, and makes heavy use of traditional RPG conventions such as dice and tile-based movement.
